name: Southwest Chicken Salad I
author: Sandy
summary: This is a highly seasoned salad that is a nice change from the typical 'taco' version. Even my kids and their friends love it!
ingredients: 4  cooked skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into strips
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
½ small red onion, sliced into rings
directions: In a covered jar, mix the lime juice, olive oil, salt, garlic, cilantro, chili powder, and cumin
Cover, and shake until well blended
Place the lettuce in a large bowl
Toss with the chicken, black beans, onion, and tomato
Just before serving, toss with the dressing mixture and Parmesan cheese
Serve with tortilla chips, either crushed over the top of the salad, or on the side
